ygData.subject: Re: Can you cast spells above your level? (text)
ygData.msgSnippet: You loose all spells in memory when you die....You cannot memorize the higher rank spells if you fall back below the level (i.e. 12th level wiz falls back to
ygData.messageBody:
You loose all spells in memory when you die....You cannot memorize the
higher rank spells if you fall back below the level (i.e. 12th level wiz
falls back to 11th).



-----Original Message-----
From: McCartney, Michael R [mailto:Michael.McCartney2@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 4:14 PM
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eq_wizards] Can you cast spells above your level? (text)


From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>

If you just made level 12, buy some spells, go out and die, lose a level
(back to 11)... Are you still able to cast those spells?

This has never happen to me, but I was wondering what happened? Would you
simply not be able to memorize the higher level spells? Or would you be
able to memorize them, just not be able to cast them? or would you be able
to cast them because you have been to that level?

Thanks for any responses.

Drev
